channel.title: Blank Server without Client
channel.description:
I've been looking everywhere for a Blank Server or a Server that doesn't require a Client to be run, like so it can just run on MoparScape's web client.. I had BlankScape but that had too many bugs on the webclient. I've just recently been capped so I have to wait until the end of the month for my internet to reset, but I will still download a source if it doesn't require a client.
Thank you for all help.

item.title: Blank Server without Client
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Requests are not allowed, sorry. Please use the search feature.

Read full topic

item.title: Blank Server without Client
item.dc:creator: @brickwood brickwood
item.description:
@brickwood wrote:

[quote=“Ezpilz, post:2, topic:388256”]very easy…
download any 317 blank source… and then run it… open moparscape web client… write in IP address and port… it should work … NOTE:
if the source have custom items or NPCs or places… it wont load in the moparscape web client cuz its 317 blank client …
hope this help ;D[/quote]

I have tried that!
I have downloaded multiple sources that come with clients and I try run them but they disconnect me after I log in.
I need something similar to BlankScape where there are no NPCs etc…
Do you have any suggestions or links?

Read full topic

item.title: Blank Server without Client
item.dc:creator: @Ezpilz Ezpilz
item.description:
@Ezpilz wrote:

very easy…
download any 317 blank source… and then run it… open moparscape web client… write in IP address and port… it should work … NOTE:
if the source have custom items or NPCs or places… it wont load in the moparscape web client cuz its 317 blank client …
hope this help ;D

Read full topic
